# Timezone Conversion Challenge - Copilot Instructions

This is a React TypeScript coding challenge focused on fixing timezone conversion issues when handling dates from APIs.

## Project Overview
- **Challenge Type**: Timezone conversion debugging
- **Framework**: React with TypeScript
- **Target**: CodeSandbox deployment
- **Goal**: Fix UTC â†” Local timezone conversion functions

## Key Files
- `src/timezoneUtils.ts` - Main challenge file (fix the conversion functions)
- `src/SimulationForm.tsx` - Form demonstrating the timezone issue
- `src/mockAPI.ts` - Simulates backend API with UTC dates
- `README.md` - Comprehensive challenge instructions

## Development Notes
- Project builds successfully with `npm run build`
- Development server runs with `npm start`
- All dependencies are installed and configured
- TypeScript errors in editor are normal (language server issues) - project compiles fine
